add_patch_msg_01:
Caution: Cannot recieve data from an older
patch version!
npc_boss_mes_01:
́Hey, do you know about the Spot
Pass feature?
ā
The Spot Pass feature will send and recieve
data whenever you are connected to the internet.
ā
As you travel to various lands, you might encounter
a special Master through Street Pass and Spot Pass.
ā
When you recieve data, a Stealth Box may appear
at the Wi-Fi Square. Remember to check for it.
npc_boss_mes_01_ask:
́Do you wish to recieve data through
the Spot Pass feature?Ă
npc_boss_flow_19:
́Apologies. It seems like
I was unable to create extra data.
meet_change_08:
̂Able to captivate any monster out there,
the fantastic, highest grade　 Ultra-marbled Meat ……
ā
Be sure to use it wisely!
ȁ！
npc_boss_mes_01_yes:
́Alright!
Spot Pass feature activated!
ā
Spot Pass can receive data even when
DQM3jP is not running and or 3DS is closed.
npc_boss_mes_01_no:
́Understood.
You can change the setting at any time.
npc_boss_mes_02_ask:
́Stop Spot Pass and set
function to off?Ă
wifi_ranking_10:
́Take care, and come back any time!
I'll be waiting here, as usual!
npc_boss_mes_02_yes:
́Spot Pass is currently off.
ā
If you want to active the Spot Pass function again,
talk to me any time!
profile_00:
́Welcome to the Wi-Fi Square!
Here you can change your profile data.
ā
npc_boss_mes_02_no:
́Understood. Made no changes to the
current Spot Pass Setting.
ā
If you want to make changes to the Spot Pass
setting, talk to me any time!
training_04:
́You just need to organize the two teams that
you would like to use and battle against.
ā
npc_boss_mes_getbox:
́When you recieve data, a stealth box
will now appear! Wata wata.
npc_boss_flow_1:
́
You may call me BOSS. I am here to assist you with the many internet services provided.Ă
wifi_battle_00:
́Welcome to the Wi-Fi Battle reception desk.
ā
npc_boss_flow_2:
́Wata wata. It sppears that you haven't
agreed to the terms of service.
ā
To use Spot pass, you must first accept the
latest version of the terms of service agreement.
ā
Would you like to view it now? Ă
wifi_battle_01: ́Would you like to participate in a Wi-Fi battle?Ă
npc_boss_flow_3:
́Unfortunately, if you don't agree to the terms
of service, you cannot use Spot Pass.
ā
If you change your mind, come see me at any
time to read them! Wata wata.
npc_boss_flow_4:
́Unfortunately, if you don't agree to the terms
of service, you cannot use Spot Pass.
ā
Would you like to change Spot Pass settings
to off at this time? Ă
wifi_battle_03:
́Oh no! It looks the Mii or Player's name you wish
to use is not allowed in our Wi-Fi mode.
npc_boss_flow_5:
́The SD card is not inserted or cannot
be read; Spot Pass cannot be started.
ā
Power down your 3DS and reinsert the SD card,
then come see me again.
wifi_battle_04:
́Please change your profile name, and come speak
with me again if you wish to continue.
npc_boss_flow_6:
́The SD card is not inserted or cannot
be read; Spot Pass cannot be started.
ā
Would you like to change Spot Pass settings
to off at this time? Ă
wifi_battle_05:
́Participating in Wi-Fi Battle requires an internet
connection...
ā
npc_boss_flow_7:
́The SD card cannot be read;
Spot Pass cannot be started.
ā
Power down your 3DS and reinsert the SD card,
then come see me again. Wata wata.
wifi_battle_06:
́We will be exchanging your information, monsters, and
Mii with other players publicly.
ā
npc_boss_flow_8:
́The SD card cannot be read;
Spot Pass cannot be started.
ā
Would you like to change Spot Pass settings
to off at this time? Ă
wifi_battle_07:
́Will you allow us to share this information
over the internet?Ă
npc_boss_flow_9:
́DQMJ3 PROFESSIONAL additional data
does not yet exist.
ā
Without additional data, you will be unable to
use the Spot Pass feature.
ā
Would you like to create a new additional 
data file on the SD card now?Ă
wifi_battle_08:
́Ok then, i'll use your internet
connection to recieve information.
ā
This is the Wi-Fi Battle Reception counter.
ā
Would you like to participate in the
Wi-Fi Battle?Ă

̄A monster that will help change your
profile settings. Foul mouthed, but a genuine dude.

ā

ā

data file on the SD card now?Ă

́Wata wata, well then additional
data will not be created at this time.
meet_change_00:
̂Ho ho ho! Well met!
To the Ultra-marbled meat butcher!
ā

data will not be created at this time. 
ā

to off at this time? Ă

 Ultra-marbled Meat Voucher  for 1
 Ultra-marbled Meat .
ā

Creating Additional Data.
DO NOT turn off the 3DS.
meet_change_02:
̂Exchange  Ultra-marbled Meat Voucher  for　 Ultra-marbled Meat ?
Ă
meet_change_03:
̂Oh no, that's too bad. Come back
another time then.
npc_boss_flow_15:

new Additional Data was created.
meet_change_04:
̂Ho ho ho! How wonderful!
 Ultra-marbled Meat  is ready to eat!
npc_boss_flow_16:
́Since the SD Card can't be read, I
have suspended creating Additional Data.
ā
If it's not too much trouble, could you check
your settings and come back again?
meet_change_05:
Traded in 1 Ultra-marbled Meat Voucher  and
obtained 1 Ultra-marbled Meat.

̄A stack of Golden Slimes that manages
the Wi-Fi Ranking reception desk.
npc_boss_flow_17:

Card. Suspending creation of Additional Data.
ā
Please ensure there is enough space on your
SD Card and come back again.
meet_change_06:
̂Oh, what's this? You don't have any
 Ultra-marbled Meat Voucher .
ā

̄A monster of glimmering gold. Its job
is to manage the Present Download feature.

ā
If it's not too much trouble, could you check

meet_change_07:

́If it's not too much trouble, could you check
your settings and come back again?

change Spot Pass settings.
npc_boss_flow_22:

your settings and come back again?
npc_boss_flow_23:

I wasn't able to create Additional Data.
ā
If it's not too much trouble, could you check

I've failed to create Additional Data for you.
ā
Would you like to change Spot Pass settings

REC_NPC_wifi_shop:
̄A monster that handles Street Pass Coins.
Gold-rank when it comes to reception.
npc_boss_flow_25:
́Would you like to change Spot Pass settings
to off at this time? Ă
npc_boss_flow_26:

ā
Come see me again if you'd like to use
Spot Pass at another time.
npc_boss_flow_27:
́Got it. Leaving Spot Pass settings
as they were.
ā
If you'd like to change them, come see me
again. Wata wata.

Here you can check your connection status.

wifi_ranking_00:
́Welcome! 
This is the Wi-Fi Ranking reception desk.
ā
wifi_ranking_01: ́How can I be of service today?
wifi_ranking_02:
́Come again another time.
I'll be waiting, ȁ!
wifi_ranking_03:
́Hmm? Either your Player or Mii name
contains inappropriate characters.
wifi_ranking_04:

come talk to me again later.
wifi_present_00:
́Welcome to the Wi-Fi Gift Shop, where all your
downloading needs can be fulfilled!
ā

must be connected to the internet...
ā

ā

ā

ā
How can I help you today?

ā

training_01: ́Would you like to participate in a training battle?Ă

́With the Training Battle feature, you can

ā

ā

REC_NPC_wata:
̄A monster that changes your Spot Pass settings.
Sometimes rude, but always accommodating.
REC_NPC_wifi_battle:
̄A monster that handles Wi-Fi Battles.
Has gentlemanly manners worthy of a gold body.
REC_NPC_meet:
̄A domineering but beautiful monster, whom
handles Ultra-marble Meat exchanges.
REC_NPC_training:
̄A monster that takes pride in its gold body.
Is the receptionist for the Training Battle.
terry_010:
A gold statue of a Monster Master
representative of the Great Tree.
ā
Looking closer, you notice the name
"Terry" engraved into the plate.
ā

and Challenge GP: Over 30

other Masters: Over 30
yl_010:
